ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The frosts are still popular and cover a huge level range.  But then I ve never fought in Kunark (unless you count a level 2 iksar shadow knight) or
ygData.messageBody:
Reedwind wrote:
> Oh I knew you meant that. It's a totally lame reward for that
> delivery.
> Especially since Qeynos is someplace you don't visit much
> when you get to
> the level that can operate in Kunark. What's over in that
> region? Kerra
> Island? Paneel? The Hole soon? Certainly there's little
> reason for someone
> to leave Kunark and head for Qeynos too often.

The frosts are still popular and cover a huge level range. But then I've
never fought in Kunark (unless you count a level 2 iksar shadow knight) or
Permafrost, so maybe it really isn't worth the trip.

Peace
Evulia, giving up on levelling as it only makes me die more, Tunare
